General.Name: Grande Asset Hotels and Property Public Company Limited
General.Description: Grande Asset Hotels and Property Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the hotel, property development, and rental businesses in Thailand. It also manufactures and distributes rubber gloves. The company was formerly known as Grande Asset Development Public Company Limited and changed its name to Grande Asset Hotels and Property Public Company Limited in February 2008. Grande Asset Hotels and Property Public Company Limited was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
